item.title: Multiple Linear Regression
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. item.title: Tree-based classification
item.description: Decision trees The goal is to classify or predict an outcome based on a set of predictors. library(tidyverse) library(DAAG) library(party) library(rpart) library(rpart.plot) library(mlbench) library(pROC) library(tree) library(caret) Classification Tree: Detecting email spam data data <- spam7 str(data) ## 'data.frame': 4601 obs. of 7 variables: ## $ crl.tot: num 278 1028 2259 191 191 ... ## $ dollar : num 0 0.18 0.184 0 0 0 0.054 0 0.203 0.081 ... ## $ bang : num 0.
